summary: I created this companion in celebration of my friend Kalebs birthday. Happy birthday Kaleb!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]What is this companion?
[/size]
[size=3]This companion is a flame atronach that goes by the name of Pants. Dont ask, she has some issues.

[/size][size=6]What does she do? 
[/size]
[size=3]She shoots fire. What did you expect? Shes a [i]FLAME[/i] [b][i]ATRONACH.

[/i][/b][/size][size=6]Where can you find her?

[/size][size=3]Shes quite the alcoholic, so you can find her in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

[/size][size=6]Is this companion lore-friendly?

[/size][size=3]Is a slaughterfish smoking a pipe lore-friendly?

[/size][size=6]Is she able to be married?
[/size][/center] [center][size=3]Nope.[/size][/center]
[size=6] [/size]
[center]Thanks for giving my mod a chance! Its my first mod, so any help would be greatly appreciated! If you find any bugs with this mod, please report them![/center]
author: MonarchVek
